document.full_text: apart from the murmur of voices and bursts of laughter, nothing was heard on thursday from 12 jurors studying the evidence in hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam's high-profile insider trading trial.
document.title: rajaratnam trial: no word from jury on day 4
lines_and_colors: apart from the murmur of voices and bursts of laughter, nothing was heard on thursday from 12 jurors studying the evidence in hedge fund manager raj rajaratnam's high-profile insider trading trial.
